/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the road, indicating a busy day in the city. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the sky, showcasing the architectural prowess of the city. The image is a beautiful blend of urban life and natural beauty, encapsulating the essence of Beijing.
